item.title: PetroGas Co 10-K
item.description: PetroGas Co, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 27, 2022 had 10543 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 182 instances financial - 130 instances may - 98 instances oil - 94 instances shares - 90 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
